text: Thomas William Standen (May 8, 1941â€“September 22, 1998) was a Brazilian singer-songwriter, better known as Terry Winter. He started singing in the 1960s in Portuguese, under the name Tommy Standen but it was like Terry Winter and performing in English who became himself more famous in Brazil and Latin America, with the hit "Summer Holiday". title: Terry Winter (singer)
